short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get access to contact details of LinkedIn, GitHub and StackOverflow profiles
short.pl: Uzyskaj dostęp do danych kontaktowych profili LinkedIn, GitHub i StackOverflow
short.ru: Получите доступ к контактным данным профилей LinkedIn, GitHub и StackOverflow
short.uk: Отримайте доступ до контактних даних профілів LinkedIn, GitHub та StackOverflow

long.pl,ru,uk:
Quick, easy and legal manage candidates from different social networks.
Open the candidate's page on one of the indicated sites and in one motion export profile to your database - the machine will automatically fill in the key information about the candidate and find alternative contact details.
Built-in analyzer prevents duplicate candidate profiles in your database when working with different sources
Write and share comments to the candidates directly on their pages on the Internet, see the history of interaction with them, add the selected job in the long list or move to the desired recruitment funnel stage.
Benefits:
* Legally!
* No duplicates
* Support teamwork
* Work with a vacancy directly on the candidate's page on the Internet
* Collection and storage of the entire history of interaction with the candidate

TalentScan.Pro is your digital assistant in recruitment 

Delegate routine to the machine - enjoy live communication!
